title: Shriram Finance plans to raise $1 bn from overseas in next 6 months
description: Shriram Finance plans to raise USD 1 billion from overseas in the next six months to support business growth. The company aims to secure USD 300 million by October and the remaining amount by the end of the financial year. This includes loans from institutions like Asian Development Bank and United States Development Finance Corporation.
